name: Drake
text: I called them at 1 pm about installing speakers I bought at bestbuy they were ready too install two hours later. I had to go to work, but they installed everything and then drove my car back to work and it sounds great. They beat best buys prices by almost 200 dollars and if you have to get speakers installed I would go to them as they have the best prices and really good customer service.

name: Cindy Hosea
text:
As of today I would not recommend them.  Two weeks ago I went in to get a new radio for my car.  They promised the one they put in with all the bells and whistles would be
perfect.  Well the radio came in with wrong parts as they had reorder that was fine.  Finally they had all they needed although they kept calling saying you need this and that we said ok.  We took my car to them and they had it 4 days.  Finally after a lot of phone calls they said it was done.  It tried to sync my phone and it did but no sound out of the speakers.  They couldn't figure out the problem so the installer promised he'd call the manufacturer Monday morning and call me.  No phone call.  I called him and got his voice mail.  No return call.  I called the shop and was told they would call as soon as he got in .  No call.  I also called Sirus to have that transferred from my other radio but they didn't hook it up.  So here I sit with a very expensive radio and CD player.  At this point the ball is in their court and I'm waiting to see what they do. Until then I would no recommend them to anyone.
I now will give them 5 stars.  They have fixed my problems and everything works perfect.

I would go to them again.

name: Jason Smith
text: I ordered 1500.00 worth of stuff and was told it would take 3 days but it took over 30 days and everyday I called I they got smart with me and gave me excuse after excuse of why it wouldn't come I am now a dealer for scar audio and many other products and when I order something it never takes over three days it is obvious that he spent the money on something else and had to try to get it back before he can order my stuff

name: erika smalley
text: Save your time. This place is absolutely ridiculous. My husband went for his appointment at 6pm and didn't get home until 10pm and they still didn't have the rca wires to hook his speakers up. We are now on day two, so far three hours into it and no speakers hooked up.

name: Brent Smalley
text: Got speakers set up---took over 7 hours and 2 days. Nothing was bolted down and wires were loosely ran. Now my speakers are completely out. Don't recommend!!!

name: Charles Garrett
text: Awesome

name: kitty cahoon
text:
Nice,knowledgeable, courteous&friendly.
David & his son installed my new Sony 4k projector today. Could not be happier. They shared in my excitement. Great to have local people you can trust  for a quality job at a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity !

name: wanda biggs
text: We were nervous about hanging our TV.  David answered all our concerns. David did an excellent job for us.  He really is a pro.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Chris Parker
text: David and Chase did a wonderful job mounting our 82" Tv in the living room.  They were professional, detail-oriented and took the time to answer ALL of our questions (we had a lot).  I greatly appreciate their service and would advise anyone mounting a Tv to call them.  They are worth every penny!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity and the return business Sir!

name: Lila Brand
text: WOW! I cannot say enough positive things about TV Installation Pros. As usual, I was panicking last minute, and they came and mounted two tv's the same day! They were incredibly professional, quick, and did a FABULOUS job. TV Installation Pros did a fantastic job!! You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you  very much for the opportunity!

name: Steve McLain
text:
David is a true professional and a very knowledgeable installer.  I knew David was the man for the job when he not only answered my call but he also followed up with his quote a promised.  He arrived early to my home and after a few minutes getting my input on what I wanted to see, he went to work.

I could not be happier with the outcome!  He mounted my 55” Samsung Frame with a flush mount and even programmed it for me in just over an hour.  He cleaned up the job and made sure I was completely satisfied.  It looks awesome!

Smart TV’s today are not like the TV’s of old days and I would highly recommend you call David to do it right.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Leigh Hawkins
text: I want to thank David for mounting my 50 inch smart tv!  He takes time to explain and demonstrate how to navigate around the TV with all the new technical features.  David is very informed and very pleasant!  I would definitely recommend this company and will not hesitate to call them again.  I will also talk up this business to all of my friends here in Foley!  5 star for sure!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Cherie Jones
text: Mr. David is amazing!! I call him yesterday afternoon and he worked us in today. He put up two TV for us he did great work. He is very friendly and does a great job. This is the second time we called him as he was here a few months ago to put our 65” up above the fireplace. Recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Paul Gilmore Sr
text: Super good job mounting our 3 tvs and soundbars!...We lost the cables to our living room soundbar but these guys had the cables we needed on the truck and was able to finish the work! Forever gracious guys, thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity Sir!

name: Chris Matthews
text: Incredible service! Very friendly and responsive, and was willing to walk me through step by step of mounting my tv so I could learn to do it myself. Great guy!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity Sir!

name: Patricia Brooks
text: I called this guy up had a couple questions about my TV he was very very helpful. I will definitely be calling him back .You don’t find too many people like that who would help you over the phone and solve your problem for you over the phone without a dime. Thank u so much.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity!

name: Kelly Cramer
text: Highly recommended! We needed our T.V. mounted on our uneven rock fireplace. They were very professional, responsive, and did a fantastic job. They were able to meet my time frame and were very neat and tidy.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Stacy Preadmore
text: David was very professional from the first time I contacted him. Our 40 foot motorhome outside TV broke and we were unable to replace it ourselves because we could not purchase the exact same TV. He showed up within 2 days of contacting him and was able to give us something even better than before. We always wished we had a swivels TV outside on the RV and with a little ingenuity he made that happen. Now I can sit outside with the fire and watch TV and I am so happy. I highly reccomend their services,  they are also very reasonably priced.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Davidd3 Dial
text:
David and team installed TVs , when mine was purchased a year ago .. excellent job, very professional.. i have called back twice for additional services and response time is awesome..
Thanks

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunities Sir!

name: Chuck Welsh
text:
Be very careful using these people..installation went ok, but removal of old tv was disaster..were told old tv was heavy and to bring two people..only.one showed.
Resulting on severely damaging my stairs..not only refused to fix but installer upon dropping the tv down the stairs injured his toe..he should have requested help..owner blamed me and threatened to sue...multiple curse words thrown at me..very, very unerving experience..

resp.text: Chuck Welsh calls on a Saturday begging for help on a Sunday to remove an old TV out of a credenza and install a new one. We ask him to verify it is a 32in TV which is easily manageable by one technician and size of tv is how we charged...Chuck the liar had a huge almost 50" tv. Not only did Chuck Welsh lie about the size of his TV but no mention he needed it moved down a flight of very steep stairs which would require a dolly and could have been dispatched with the technician.... as usual we find a way to accommodate our customers even on emergency calls, after removal and installation of new TV,  Chuck the liar hands the technician a white bed sheet to wrap around TV to maneuver TV down the stairs. Technician did as asked, lost control of TV smashed his foot and broke 5 step boards..... Chuck the liar then called seven times before 7 a.m. the next morning leaving messages on our phone for us too come repair his rotten steps. Then sends numerous text messages to harass our dispatcher. I would love nothing more than to meet Chuck the Liar behind the wood shed for tea and cookies .

name: Marlon Jenkins
text: Very helpful in explaining things. Very honest and truthful about everything. Takes the time to talk and not rush off the phone like so many others do. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity!

name: Austin Thompson
text: These guys are professionals and worth every penny of their work! Got us set up no problem. Great guys and I would highly recommend their service.

resp.text: Thank you Sir!

name: Brandi Brasher
text: TV Installation Pros were prompt and thorough!  TV's and soundbars all in and looking good!!  thank you!

resp.text: Thank you  Ma'am very much for the opportunity!

name: Benjamin Morrison
text: Showed up on time, extremely profesional, and knowledgeable.  Cleaned up after they finished.  Would highly recommend for anyone looking to mount TV in the future.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity Sir!

name: Domelyn Garibaldi
text: I texted David to install a simple VHF/UHF antenna on my roof and hook up to two TV’s. He took his sweet time getting back to me with a “quote.” In between, this guy quizzed me about whether or not the antenna needs to be assembled, the splitter, coaxial line, etc. I continued to wait and wait for a response. Finally, David comes up with a “ball park” figure: $400. + $75 “travel fee,” which is a $51.5 mile drive from his place of business to my house. Previous to this, I received another quote for $150. total install, and he didn’t nitpick about whether or not the antenna out of the box was assembled or not...and NO “TRAVEL FEE!” Needless to say, I did not hire David @ TV Install Pros to di any work whatsoever, nor will I be recommending them to any of my friends in the future.  When a company is more interested in the almighty dollar then fair prices,  that company doesn’t deserve any business whatsoever!

resp.text: {1} Not a Customer {2} We are a very busy company who responds ASAP-   {3} Entity was furious over $75 "trip charge":The cost to transport a Van, tools, 2 techs, fuel cost, insurance, maintenance, etc  on a round trip from Foley, Alabama to Navarre Florida 3.2 hours in "great traffic"...{4} Entity responded" because of $75 trip charge"  I Quote " what a rip off artist" {5} Next message I Quote " Read my masterpiece review" "Your a scumbag"   ...............Never once have we had someone so rude! ....And if they didn't agree with the cost ,"why not just move on like evryone else !!!!.Instead of harass a company with multiple follow-up messages!........Obviously this person doesn't understand the cost associated with In-Home Service businesses!

name: Grover Hart
text: These guys do excellent work and very easy to work with! They have mounted multiple Tvs in both of our condos in Orange Beach! Every one picture perfect! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity Sir!

name: Lady Miller
text: Called for info about my broken tv. The guy was super helpful and gave me the info I needed to fix my tv in time for the superbowl!

resp.text: We pride ourselves in solving customers issues over the phone if possible. Thanks for the review!

name: Brooks Hubbard
text: Great guys! Great Prices! Highly skilled at what they do!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity Sir!

name: James Urrutia
text: Horrible experience. The guy showed up high as a kite. Rude and obnoxious. Never again will contact these people.

resp.text:
FAKE REVIEW!  FAKE NAME!   Obvious Competitor! We have no record of this person on our past schedule. Online search by Google and Facebook has zero findings for the fake name!....Not the 1st attack by competitors in the last year. They have also attacked our Yelp listing and managed to make our Google listing disappear for 2 months.  Most of our work comes from repeat customer referrals, Condo Owners, Management Companies, Interior Designers & Interior Decorators in the Orange Beach, Gulf Shores, Fort Morgan , And Perdido Key areas, therefore only a small amount comes from Google or other online sources, therefore their attacks don't hurt us as much as it would other businesses. If your looking for references before having your job done, we would be happy to provide you with many & their telephone numbers !  This review has been reported to Google but  our experience with google , they will do nothing nor do they ever reply back!......Welcome to doing business in the digital global world!  Tv Installation Pros provides perfect precision tv installation jobs only!!!! GUARANTEED!

#1 in Tv-Audio-Visual  Services on the Gulf Coast

name: Theresa Taylor
text: We had 3 flat screen tv's  mounted by these guys! Not only were they very respectful and did exceptional work, they cleaned up after themselves.......After dealing with many contractors remodeling our home that was HUGE! Thank you guys!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity Ma'am!

name: Mike Tillman
text: Excellent job  mounting and installing our 4  Samsung tvs!  Very skilled in what they do! Was also able to mount our soundbars to the tvs  , much better than  mounted on the wall! Looks much better as well.....   will recommend to all!    Mike T

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity Sir!

name: Ben Redmond
text: Excellent work! Very professional and made sure everything was cleaned up! Mounted all of our TVs at the condo.....Thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity!

name: Charlie Miller
text: Came Wright away very professional put up TV and  mount hooked up internet did a great job very neat and friendly he is definitely a 5* rating

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity Sir!

name: Tom Stanford
text: Showed up on time!!!!!!Thats big! Did professional work and cleaned up after......5 out 5

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity!

name: Stesha Cheebur
text: My sub stopped working in my car and I googled a stereo place near my house. I stopped by to see if they could take a look. They fixed the issue and didn’t charge me. Excellent service! Will definitely be coming back.

name: Alex Tejada
text:
Absolutely awesome radio. Great installation completed in one day. Integration with original f150 controls. As you can see Apple play integrated KENWOOD radio.

Installed on a 2010 F150 Lariat Model.

name: Matt Bess
text: Brought my car to them to diagnose why my speakers were not working. First thoughts on the individual that spoke to me was that they did not won't to help me. Left my car with them on a Friday and never received a call on the status of car. Called Monday morning and was told that the tech stopped working on my car to handle a appointment. Waited till 5:30 and called again for them to say it had been done earlier. Went to picked up my car the next day and first thing noticed was the nut that goes under my shifter knob was missing. At first they seemed like it never existed till a tech found it and put it on. Last thing notice was a massive mark under the driver's door. Owner pulls up camera recording and proceeds to claim that the damage was there previously due to how the light was hitting the car in one frame yet in another frame, the damage wasn't there. Overall the work was done poorly and now I have a noticeable mark on my car. Will not go to this business again nor will I  recommend anyone to go there.

name: Bobby
text: Did a great job of installing a new stereo at a reasonable price. Friendly & informative service!  Would highly recommend!

name: Shannon Tucker
text: I had a system put in my car years ago. In 2018 I had my son's system put in for graduation and in 2021 I had my daughter's system installed. Very professional, great customer service!! I will always choose them

name: Gracie Smith
text: This place is great! They do an awesome and absolute professional job with window tinting! Matt Billions from Edwards Chevrolet-280 referred me here and I’m glad he did. Incredible experience! Thank you Sounds Great!

name: Shawn Martin
text:
Very courteous nice people 👍
Excellent advisors on car audio!

name: Teddy Rhodes
text: Always a pleasure. Such an amazing job!

name: Bill Kahmar
text: Great place .I upgreaded my  speakers  and sub and amp  on my 2008 civic.Emmitt was very courteous and very knowledgeable. I will  definitely go back.Im very happy

name: Matthew S
text: Professional, willing to go over detailed options for audio, knowledgeable about their products. Heat 🔥  🔥  🔥

name: Richard Weeks
text: Over the past 20+ years of dealing with car audio shops I've had a lot of crummy experiences with them and their salesmen. This has definitely NOT been the case with the Sounds Great on 31. I've been very impressed with the way I've been treated there and the prices on subs and parts (I can't speak for labor) have been pretty close to Amazon (power wire is way cheaper to buy from them). I'll happily pay a few more bucks to get their customer service and helpful advice if need be!

name: Chris Gray
text: Rick and the rest of the folks here offer top notch service. Sold me the exact radio I needed and didn't try to upsell me on anything I didn't want or need. They also went above and beyond to fix a problem with my back speakers that was pre-existing. Highly recommend.

name: Leon Sage
text: I do not like there service at all installed a line out convert very poorly and want me to drop my car off instead of dealing with a issue on the spot no good drop ya car off in am so we can make u wait till six pm to fix it will post next review of there botched install

name: Steven Bell
text: Stay away from these guys. ZERO customer service skills and acted as if I was wasting thier time. I have used them in the past but moving forward I will spend my money elsewhere.

name: Abbie Weir
text: Some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. The dealership I purchased from contracted these guys to install remote start on my vehicle. It took 4 hours only to get it home and realize it doesn't even work. Even with an appt they don't have any idea how long it will take to fix what should have been done right the first time. They want me to drop it off and then call me when it's ready. I live over a hour away and can't just drop my car off and wonder the streets for half the day. At this point I will pay someone else to do the job Sounds Great should have done in the first place.

name: Raven Parker
text: Would definitely recommend this place! Emmett helped me out and made sure I got the right parts for a radio I needed installed. So helpful and made my week a lot easier!!

name: Clay Barnett
text:
Came here after hearing good reviews for many years. Inherited a fifteen year old Nissan Frontier with a cassette deck and busted speakers. My budget was low but I did want something I could connect my phone to for when I commute in the truck. They didn't push high end items and met my budget.

A year later, I lost sound in one speaker, then shortly after, the other. Took it back; they showed me the old corroded wires, replaced them with new free of charge.

While I felt that they should've done that originally, I was happy that their lifetime guarantee was something they stood behind and honored. Would use again. Still own the truck after 3 years and have no problems.

name: JAREN BRAXTON
text: Just went today to get some wiring done on my heated seats but their was a short in the wire so it would blow a fuse every time it got plugged into the big lighter. I had a friend install a plug from something else on it since he couldn’t figure out any other way to wire it. But when the guy at sounds great the electrical technician learned the plug wasn’t from the kit and that their plug he installed didn’t work either he had another idea to just take the plugs out of the equation and just wired it it worked!!!😊they literally ran into a dead end and we’re about to give up but found a work around with it in the end. They definitely pass the test as being a trustworthy business since they didn’t engage in anything that could have caused electrical damage to my vehicle. They were up front with me and very helpful/understanding. I’ll definitely come here again if I need any wiring done I definitely recommend this place. Everyone is super friendly and I like the sense of humor the shop has.

name: Todd Jones
text: A perfect audio installation was done today. I had special needs and salesperson JS went out of his way to make sure I was happy. I have been dealing with Sounds Great for years and today was just another pleasurable experience. I highly recommend Sounds Great!

name: sharron bartlette
text: I wanted to have my windows tinted and was referred by a local reputable dealership. Could not have them perform the work that was needed due to the abnormal amount of time they quoted was needed. Six hours to tint car windows is too excessive.  I was disappointed that I had to take my business elsewhere.

name: Terrance Brown
text:
I got my system from here I have to keep taking it back Emmett keep telling me to let it rest that is not what I bought it for.. then he tells me not to turn it up to loud... why the point?

Updated I returned system only to get 525.00 I was charged for installation and wires. I should have taken them to small claims, I just wanted out to have nothing else to do with them.

name: Jonathan Taylor
text: I came in to replace my factory speakers. I got great advice and friendly service. They were able to install the speakers immediately with a minimal wait. The install price was about $50 less than a competitor also. I’d highly recommend them for any of your audio needs.

name: David Mundt
text: The only place to go for window tint.  They've done at least 4 vehicles for me and all have been excellent.  Looking forward to them installing new speakers, current ones in an old Land Cruiser are shot.  Guys there are very professional and provide 5-star service.

name: J R
text:
Emmett knows his stuff & is extremely courteous.
I had an amp installed & they did an outstanding job. Thank you guys for doing such a great job & thanks Emmett for your help - you guys do top notch work..

name: Glen Aikman
text: I had to pleasure of shopping at this store last Friday. The guys running the place are very kind and knowledgeable about their products. Also, this location listens to what your trying to do, and then gives you recommends on your needs without trying to up sell. Thank for your help!

name: Rick P
text: I've been coming here for over 35 years. Great service. You can get a high end system or just a plain stereo installed. Hands free phone, backup cameras, alarms, anything for any car. My mom needed a basic radio to replace her factory one in her older car. They took care of her and she was thrilled. My daughter just got a new system today in her 05 Toyota and now she has hands free phone which is so much safer. Not pushy, they sell you what you want and can afford. Installation is fast and professional. This is a great local business that still sells the way It used to be before the big box stores showed up. Ask for Rick. He'll take care of you. (Our names are a coincidence)

name: Christopher Dowdell
text: Good people

name: Delon Green
text: Great been doing business with Emmitt for 20 years!

name: Blake Sheffield
text: The prices you’ll find are by no means low, but they know their stuff and do a solid job.  I also had a hassle-free experience with getting a previously purchased receiver replaced with a new one after the first one stopped working.

name: Michael Cavender
text: Went in & picked out a radio & speakers for my car.  The salesman suggested that I make an appointment for installation instead of waiting around all day in hopes of getting worked into their schedule. I made the appointment for a few days later & when I arrived they did not have the stereo I picked not in stock, even the display model was gone! I was off of work & drove 50 minutes to get there and NO RADIO! The salesman apologized & said "I guess I should have written it down." The owner offer a different radio, but it was not what I wanted. They offered to order the radio I wanted & reschedule the appointment. The salesman was happy to report that they had a cancellation the next day at the same time & ask if I wanted it. I asked if the radio was going to be in by then, otherwise there was no need for an appointment. He said, "Good point."  My experience with Sounds Great was like a run in with the Keystone Cops! I went to Automotive Concepts & got the exact stereo & speakers I wanted professionally installed the next day.

name: Kevin McPherson
text: These guys are the best! Great help from really knowledgeable guys. If you need and kind of mobile sound equipment, this is the place to go.  They are also a certified JL Audio distributor, which in my opinion is the best brand of speakers and sub bass units!

name: Jay Rock
text: Very helpful

name: Liz Popwell
text: Very, very helpful.  Went in with a question about why my new iPhone wouldn't pair with my FJ Cruiser and Jeremy was so very nice to help me fix my problem.  If I ever new a new audio system I will most certainly be going here for one.  I highly recommend these guys.

name: Grant Shipley
text:
Tried to make an appointment to get my remote start looked at and the guy says bring it Wed at 9am. I say I can't do 9am, I need an afternoon appointment. Guy says he can't guarantee he can get to it with an afternoon appointment because he never knows what kind of jobs will come in that day!
Well you do know what kind of job will be there. That's the whole reason for the appointment!

I'm not an idiot and I don't expect to be treated like one.

name: Roland Beaver
text: Professional in every way quick installation of your audio products and very friendly and helpful.

name: Brandon White
text: High quality work, always stand behind their work. I've taken at least 10 cars here for tinting, stereo installations, etc and have always been very happy with the results!

name: Truman Fancher
text: Rick and the guys are always professional and are as particular as you about your sound. I can't recommend Sounds Great enough.... My new Kenwood Excelon, well it "sounds great"!! 10 Stars!

name: Dylan Hein
text: Both times I have needed car stereo equipment in the Birmingham area since I've lived here I've had the same experience.  I call every car audio place I can find and nobody has what I'm looking for.  Then I come across Sounds Great Stereo and they have what I need every time in stock.  They also have great customer service, are very friendly and polite, and are really knowledgeable and helpful.  After doing this a second time, I'm putting their number in my phone to avoid any more car audio headaches.

name: Lloyd McCourt
text: Shut up on a Saturday one hour before closing and was driving down the road with my new stereo system, deck only, within 40 minutes. Great friendly staff and terrific selection.

name: Mike Lane
text: Not overly friendly but very business oriented.

name: micheal mcrina
text: Excellent customer service...they explain thoroughly about every aspect of work they've done. Mr. Emmit is very kind and gets what's best for you. No bs

name: Cutty Dean
text: Emmett was great.  Great service didn't  pressure me into buying  unnecessary thing like most places

name: Dale Wisely
text: Had a complex installation, as these things go. They provided excellent consultation before the install and then prompt and good-quality installation. And, miracle of miracles, considerably cheaper than I had predicted. This is the place to go.

name: Magda Marcin
text: Excellent customer service! I was bringing my own dual dashcam that I bought online. They did the job perfectly. The staff is there for many years and they now their job like no one else. They were very helpful. I had some suggestions on how to install the camera and they applied it.They are pretty busy all the time so it showes me that it is worth coming there because others do!! If can advise something to others: don't do it cheap, do it good and do it with them!

name: Kalico Gecko
text:
Great group of guys! Rick is knowledgable and they have world class Customer Service. Highly recommend. Will never shop anywhere else!
-JH

name: Matthew Lippy
text: Great knowledge, courteous and timely!  Will definitely go back.

name: Theresa LoRusso
text: Had a weird install of a back up system for a 1990 Toyota Sunrader camper and the guts took it in stride , sold me the right products and they are working as a great retrofit. The cost was more than expected but I have heard horror stories on bad installs for retrofits so I went to the masters and I am glad I did. Saving up for the steep system next

name: Prentice Jones
text: The guys at Sounds Great are very good at what they do. I told them exactly what I was looking for and they hooked me up with a decent sounding system at an affordable price. I will always go to Sounds Great for my audio equipment.

name: Dustin McCoy
text:
I've had 2 cars get tinted and 1 car had a radio installed at Sounds Great and every time I went I was met with great customer service.  The shop is just like other local sound shops I used to go to as a kid looking at stereo's, amps, and the like for my car.   The guys truly go out of their way to make sure you are satisfied with your visit.  I've read some negative reviews, but I can't imagine anyone would be dissatisfied with going here.  I would keep in mind that this is a busy shop, and if you're wanting something installed there, you're probably going to have to make an appointment, especially on a Saturday.

The radio I bought for my S2000 was not able to be installed that day, but it was a Saturday so I was not surprised.  I ended up making an appointment for the following Saturday.  When I arrived for my appointment, we went over exactly what I ordered and they gave me an estimated time the car would be completed.  Then they called me when it was time to pick up the car.  The radio looked great and the even the dash controls worked as they were supposed to.

The first time I had window tint applied the car was a BRZ. The second car I took to them was my S2000.  Both times the tint jobs were spot on.  No bubbles could be seen when they were finished and they didn't put some random sticker under the tint for advertising.

I just moved to town last year, and the shop was recommended to me by a local dealership, as they used them to tint some of their cars, and I'm glad they did.  I will continue to take my cars to Sounds Great for all my tinting and stereo needs.

name: Michael Daugherty
text: Excellent shop be around for ever, they carry quality products and provide great service

name: Charles McLin
text: Tommy was the perfect example of what great customer service is all about

name: Martin Santana
text: Went in there to ask a few questions about installing an after market Android Auto to my minivan and they were very knowledgeable and explained everything with very details of what it was involved and what I gained and loose from the factory stereo

name: Tommy Barberini
text: Great people, very knowledgeable, friendly and willing to take the time to explain & answer questions. Ask for Rick, great guy.

name: Mike Carrasco
text: Very professional place,a little bit over priced though.

name: Stephen Young
text: Decent selection and friendly sales people.

name: letmynuttzgo
text: Modern day CONS!!! These guys will say and do anything to get your money....... Over and over again

name: Skip Warren
text: Knowledgeable and curteous sales person.  Good price, warranty, quick installation.  So much better than dealing with poor service and inept sales and service of big box stores.  Treated my 16 yr old who was buying a car stereo with respect.  We will definately return.  Thanks Emmitt.

name: Robert Burns
text:
Good Installation Good Prices Decent Help.

Don't go in here expecting chit chat. The staff is very blunt. You get yes and no answers. Not a place to "research" If you aren't up on Car Audio this might not be your place.

Staff was very reasonable.  "Ordered" a 12" Rockford Fosgate Sub but it wouldnt fit. They adjusted the price and gave me 2 10" sub's and a bit better amp. Fast Installation.

name: Akinajin
text: I have bought sub's, amp's, and had them build a custom box and install. They do great work!

name: J John
text: Very professional staff that knows how to match your needs with the right product without trying to stuff more on you than you need. Installation on my Kenwood was excellent very pleased and satisfied, would recommend to anyone.

name: Carl Cathey
text: Staff were quick to answer any questions, and were not overbearing.

name: Cain
text: Awesome! The service and quality was definitely worth the money.

name: michael epperson
text:
( Very bad customer service ).

I went in on monday ( 10-1-2012 ) at 4 pm to buy a radio.
There was 3-4 employees in store doing nothing. I was in store for 20 mins looking at radios and no one said a word to me. They ignored me the whole time i was there. I was in there to see about getting a radios with gps for my locksmith company vehicle and was gonna buy 3 others if it worked out.
I went to best buy and got exactly what i needed. Don't waste your time with this place.

name: p fritts
text: These guys are great! Highly recommended!

name: Steve Cohee
text: Friendly & knowledgeable staff.

name: Todd Sobel
text: I have used Rick for almost every car I have  owned.  The price and service are always great.

name: Aubrey Jones Vosnick
text: Great group to deal with! Cant go wrong!

name: DeUntize Peeples
text: Horrible customer service don’t wanna help you. It’s sad how it’s 2018 an most of the guys that work there give off prejudice energy.

name: Stacy Brunner
text: Nice people

name: Bo Atkinson
text: Great people, service , and products. Thank you all!

name: Sqyler _TH
text: I bought 2 12 inch subwoofers not even 2 weeks ago and one of the woofers went out, so I go in and tell them the problem and they replaced the subwoofer with a brand new one for free.

name: Armandraiz Sledge
text: Great place for car audio

name: Joshua Guinn
text: Good but very expensive

text: Expensive  !!  Bad customer service !!

text: They suck

name: Leonard Dunaway
text: Nothing special

text: Awesome place

name: BILL GRUBBS
text: Great service !!

name: Cathy Storey
text: They updated the technology on my 2008 Santa Fe and made it a 2018 Santa Fe.

name: Andrea Payne
text: High quality work with warranties

name: Walt Harris
text: Great place with fantastic service... great pricing

name: Scotty Arredondo
text: Great work

name: Aaron Olinger
text: Spending quarantine in Scottsboro, decided to get a much needed tint job on my 2000 Grand Marquis. After sorting through reviews of places I decided on going with T&A customs. After getting the tint and having waited the 3 days for the tint to fully dry I can honestly say I'm blown away by both the service AND the results that I got. Pricing is more than fair and the feeling that my vehicle was in the hands of experienced pros was present during the whole process. Any future tint work on my baby will be done by T&A Customs as well as any stereo work I might need. If you value getting unbeatable prices, amazing service, and second-to-none results done by people who know what they're doing I suggest you make a similar call 👍

name: BassheadRhino
text: The guy is very rude and opinionated. Asked him a simple question and called me names. Very unprofessional and wouldn't recommend.

resp.text: Im sorry if there was a  misunderstanding we get a very high amount of calls every day , sometimes the most busy time of the day and lately from people who are just killing time at our expense we are a small business and its very hard to complete our work with so many calls trying to help everyone get what they need

name: Andrea T
text: Thank y'all so much for setting my radio up today! It's been 2 years since I've had one in my car, and it sounds and looks amazing! Great job!!!!

resp.text: Your very welcome

name: Darryl Bailey
text: Good prices and great people.

resp.text: Darryl thank you for the great review we looked forward to working with you in the future

name: Wayne Judd
text: Very knowledgeable friendly service easy to deal with

resp.text: Thank you for the great review we look forward to doing some more work for you in the future

name: Addie Sanderson
text: Fair prices

resp.text: Addie have you even been in my store how can you leave a 2 star review if you've never even been to my shop

name: Allison Phillips
text: Sometimes you need an honest answer about what you think you need and what you actually can have. Andy Evans was totally honest with us about this very idea. He didn't try to up sale us but instead he educated us about what was realistic and a more practical approach with our project. Really refreshing and well received. Thank you Andy!!

name: Darrel Arnold
text: AVX is a great company with excellent customer service. Any issues that you might have would be addressed promptly and in a timely manner. I would highly recommend using them. They do what they say they are going.

name: Lynn Ray
text: Brenda does an excellent job of working with her clients to make sure that everything meets their requests, their expectations and that they are completely satisfied with the work. of the AVX technicians.  She is available to take your call and cheerfully makes sure it is exactly what you ordered.

name: Alex Casey
text: Andy Evans is a man of his word. It shows in his work ethic. He and his team are very honest with their clients. Highly recommend AVX for all audio and visual projects!

name: Guy Rosenstiel DMD
text: Thank you for an excellent system with fabulous sound! And Andy Evans coordinated a team that was fast, clean and friendly! Could have had a better experience!

name: Rab Stewart
text: Andy Evans and the crew at AVX are the best in the business. They are extremely knowledgeable when it comes to AV. They have helped me in both my home and office. I can't thank these people enough for giving me top notch service and products.

name: Bryant Miles
text: Working on projects Andy Evans and his team at AVX has been outstanding. They are very professional, know the market better than any other company we have worked with and are very upfront on the scope of the project. I can't say enough good things about him and his team.

name: Josh Smitherins
text: I dealt with Beau while searching for a pair of JBL Synthesis speakers.  We didn't end up making a deal, only because the speaker I was looking for was a closeout and they didn't have any in stock, but he contacted the manufacturer twice to find out information for me.  Great customer service.

name: Joe Daniel
text: Great advice, great products, awesome and timely service.  Will definitely continue working with Andy and the folks at AVX.

name: Hank Spencer
text: Andy Evans and the crew at AVX are the best in the business. They are extremely knowledgeable when it comes to AV

name: Kimberly Arnwine
text: If you want to work with someone awesome, Contact Andy. He will take care your needs!

name: Howard Whatley
text: Excellent Company, Excellent service.  Andy Evans is first class all the way

name: Brice Jackson
text: I’ve know the leadership at AVX for a long time! Quility team, quality experience!

name: Britton Eveland
text: The team at AVX are knowledgeable, and professional in the service they provides my family, I would recommend them to friends and family!

name: Ryan Mays Young
text: This friendly group of people delivers the best audio and video experience in Alabama. Not only do they install high-quality equipment but they make it look amazing. If you're looking to upgrade your house this is the way to go.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan! Please let us know if you need anything further!

name: Wes Cline
text: Andy Evan's and his team are passionate about customer service.

name: phil white
text:
Dan worked at our home and awesome.  Very knowledgeable,courteous and professional.

We had some minor issues after installation was complete that were quickly taken care of.

Dan will be the first person I call when I need this type of service again.

name: James Kerr
text: Andrew Evans is a true professional.  I trust him and AVX will all of my AV needs.

name: Harvey Trueblood
text: Andy is always on top of his game with all of his customers all the time. Would never hesitate to use him and his services or refer him and his team .

name: austin johnson
text: Extremely knowledgeable  and can do any job

text: Great folks if you never have an equipment issue.  Apparently they really aren't intrerested in retaining you as a customer after the sale is made.I'm in the process of looking for a different company who will stand behind their product line. Do not let them sell you any Integra equipment.

name: Ivy Stokes
text: Had a good install with no major issues.  I like the Sonos system AVX installed better than the Control4 system I used to have.  I would use them again.

name: David Gibson
text: These guys are at the top of their game for new technology and cool solutions for home and work!

name: Kevin Barber
text: Great company to work with.
